description: Unique identifier for each Concept across all domains.
comment: Primary Key for the CONCEPT table.

description: Unambiguous, meaningful, and descriptive name for the Concept.
Identifier of the Domain the Concept belongs to.
Identifier of the Vocabulary from which the Concept originates.
Concept class indicating the type or attribute of the Concept (e.g., 'Clinical Drug', 'Ingredient', 'Clinical Finding').
Flag indicating whether the Concept is Standard ('S'), Classification ('C'), or non-standard (NULL).
comment: Indicates concept usage status in OMOP CDM.

description: Identifier of the Concept in the source vocabulary (e.g., SNOMED-CT ID, RxNorm RXCUI). Not unique across vocabularies.
Date when the Concept became valid. Default is 1970-01-01 if unknown.
Date when the Concept became invalid. Default is 2099-12-31 if still valid.
Reason the Concept was invalidated: 'D' (Deleted), 'U' (Updated), or NULL if valid.
comment: Indicates why the concept was deprecated, if applicable.
